content.text: Billy the Bartender is a character in Threat Level Midnight who is portrayed by Andy Bernard who is played by Ed Helms. He helps Michael Scarn relax over the death of his wife. He also speaks with a Bostonian accent, and puts on "The Scarn" for Michael which initiated a dance sequence. After complaining about his satellite not working correctly, the signal is fixed when Michael Scarn hits the explosive puck into outer space and whacks the satellite.
